important_turns.user_message: I could use some assistance with rent an apartment.
important_turns.reason: Initial inquiry with broad request for assistance.

important_turns.user_message: I think we've covered everything I need!
important_turns.reason: User feels all needs have been addressed.

context_after: User: I'm looking for an apartment that is pet-friendly and near public transport.
detailed_findings.analysis: The user starts with a general request, leading to an initial low satisfaction score due to lack of specific guidance.
detailed_findings.recommendation: Provide a structured approach to gather more specific user requirements early in the conversation.

context_before: User: I also value a workspace for studying and good security features.
context_after: User: I appreciate your help! I'll work on defining my budget soon.
detailed_findings.analysis: The user expresses satisfaction with the assistance received, indicating that their needs were comprehensively addressed.
detailed_findings.recommendation: Continue to confirm with the user that all their requirements have been met before concluding the conversation.

contextual_notes: The user is in the early stages of planning and is focused on defining their budget.
The user has a clear set of priorities for their apartment search.
general_insights: Early clarification of user requirements can significantly enhance satisfaction.
Ensuring all user queries are addressed before concluding can lead to higher satisfaction scores.
Maintaining a positive and supportive tone throughout the conversation encourages user engagement.
